features: Clinically shown to maintain healthy vaginal pH
Eliminates feminine odor and relieves feminine discomfort
Each prefilled applicator lasts for 3 days
body.description: When vaginal pH is unbalanced, microorganisms can flourish, causing feminine odor and discomfort. RepHresh Vaginal Gel is specially formulated to help maintain a healthy pH balance inside your vagina, which can help relieve feminine discomfort and eliminate feminine odor. Take control of your feminine health by using RepHresh Vaginal Gel once every 3 days. A single application can maintain vaginal pH in the normal range for up to 3 days and RepHresh Vaginal Gel is safe for long-term use. Each box comes with four pre-filled, individually wrapped applicators for your convenience and hygienic use. RepHresh™ Vaginal Gel can be used: After your period, before or after sex, after douching, and for freshness anytime.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: RepHresh Odor Eliminating Gel, 0.07 Oz, 4 Count When your period is over, the last thing you want is to be held back by feminine itch, odor or discomfort. So, take control with RepHresh Odor Eliminating Gel. RepHresh Odor Eliminating Gel relieves feminine discomfort and eliminates feminine odor for up to three days. It’s CLINICALLY shown to maintain healthy vaginal pH. There is a myriad of causes for feminine itch, odor and discomfort that don’t necessarily have to do with yeast infections. Intercourse, menstruation and hormonal fluctuations all can cause an unbalanced vaginal pH. RepHresh Vaginal Gel goes straight to the source to balance and maintain your vaginal health. And it goes to work quickly, leaving you free from inconvenient symptoms for up to 3 days. That’s why RepHresh Odor Eliminating Gel is made by the #1 trusted brand to maintain vaginal health.* So, you get to work, get to play, and enjoy long-lasting freshness. Take only as directed. Do not exceed suggested dosage. If you have medical conditions or are on medication, consult a qualified health care professional. If you are pregnant or nursing, consult a qualified health care professional. Keep out of reach of children.

RepHresh Odor Eliminating Vaginal Gel RepHresh Clean Balance Feminine Freshness Kit RepHresh PRO-B Feminine Probiotic Supplement Use Eliminates feminine odor, relieves feminine discomfort. Clinically shown to maintain healthy vaginal pH A gentle alternative to traditional douching that eliminates feminine odor and relieves feminine discomfort Daily probiotic supplement that balances yeast and bacteria to maintain feminine health** Direction One application lasts up to 3 days Two-part kit cleans and balances for 3 days of freshness One capsule per day, taken orally *HCP survey 2/8/18 –3/9/18: Among gynecologists who recommend within the vaginal odor eliminating gel category. **These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Used to work now doesn’t
reviews.reviewText: When I first started using this product it was a life saver. All I had to do was use an applicator 1-2 times per week and the vaginal odor was manageable. Over the last couple months the applicator has changed several times, while I like the most recent design the product itself doesn’t seem to work as well.Also, when I first started using the product there was practically no discharge. Now there is always discharge. I’m unsure if the change was due to a product change or just my body adjusting to it.The product does seem to work but once the pH has gotten out of wack will take more applicators to balance than what it did previously. I’ll see if now that it is balanced if I can get it to maintain with regular use again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATE: HATE the new applicator. Was a perfect product. WHY CHANGE IT??
reviews.reviewText: Rephresh gel has been a lifesaver. I have suffered chronic UTIs for over 15 years. As a result of all the antibiotics, I have also suffered chronic yeast infections. Basically I have been rotating between antibiotics and antifungals pretty much constantly for a decade and a half! I have had 3 painful surgeries over that time to correct prolapse that was thought to be causing the infections, but after each surgery the infections came back. I happened to read on a website that vaginal ph plays a huge roll in vaginal health, and that antibiotics and antifungals can really wreck your vaginal ph and lead to infections, which lead to more antibiotics, etc.. It's a vicious cycle. After searching around on amazon I found this Rephresh gel and another similar product. I tried each one. The competing brand contained a strong artificial fragrance, which I am allergic to. The Rephresh worked like a charm! I can hardly believe it, but it has been MONTHS since I had a UTI! I use it once a week at bedtime, plus after sex. This product has had a really positive effect on my life, and helped relieve 15 years of suffering. It's a real shame my Gyn never knew to recommend this.12/15/15 update: As mentioned above, I had not gone more than a week or two without an infection in 15 years. I am happy to report that as of November 2015 I have gone over a year without a single infection!! The only thing I did differently was to use this gel once or twice a week. I almost can't believe it. No way to express the relief of being free of bladder pain and vaginal itching and burning for a whole year and counting.Update 03/30/17. The new applicator is horrible. It's wide V shape prevents me from getting the gel up far enough inside, and stretches the opening of my vagina irritating my urethra. After almost 2 years infection free I am back to chronic UTIs. I don't know if they changed the ingredients too. Whatever changes were made, PLEASE go back to the other design and product! This no longer works!

reviews.reviewTitle: Works like a charm to prevent both yeast infections and BV ...
reviews.reviewText: Works like a charm to prevent both yeast infections and BV -- IF you use it before/quickly after hooha ... As a person who is very prone to yeast infections and BV I really recommend this. It might not work if you are already in full-blown yeast/BV hell as it is not meant as a "treatment" ... Also, I am not a doctor, etc, but what I can say is: 1) I tend to get either yeast or BV after unprotected hooha, and after doing some research I realized the problem might be how seminal fluid affects vaginal pH ..... 2) this stuff is a pH balancer/corrector, and it has worked really well for me. I've put it in the day before, and also the day-ish after when starting to feel, let's say, slightly itchy, and it has fixed/stopped/prevented everything. It creates no smell, it makes pretty much no mess. It is kind of expensive but I still recommend because it really worked for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've struggled with a strange odour for months, I tried bv treatments, canesten probiotics, taking probiotics and nothing seemed to work. Then I got my coil removed as this could've been the cause but the odour still stayed. Then I bought this, used only 1 tube and the odour disappeared completely, it has been 2 weeks now and the odour hasn't come back. I'm actually shocked 😲
